heroMotto: Helping you be secure and compliant in cloud, so that you focus on your application.

carousel.label: HIPAA Compliance Meeting
carousel.description: Helping your Cloud Environment meet HIPAA Compliance

carousel.label: SOC 2 Compliance Meeting
carousel.description: Ensuring your Cloud Environment meets SOC 2 Compliance.

carousel.label: Secure Cloud Deployment and Management
carousel.description: We manage your cloud environment, so that you can focus on building your application.

items.title: Network Security
items.alt: IT engineer configuring network security cables in a server rack
items.description: From managing firewalls to implementing intrusion detection systems or SIEM tools, we ensure that your network is secure and protected against potential threats.

items.title: Operating System Security
items.alt: IT engineer configuring network security cables in a server rack
items.description: We can help you secure your operating systems, whether it's Windows, Linux, or macOS, by implementing best practices for patch management, access controls, and security configurations.

items.title: Application Security
items.alt: IT engineer configuring network security cables in a server rack
items.description: From implementing Authentication and Authorization tools, to ensuring secure secret management and key management, we can help you secure your applications and protect against potential vulnerabilities, all the way till memory based attacks.

items.title: Least Privelege IAM
items.alt: Hand holding a secure USB key representing identity and access management
items.description: Uncertain about how to manage user access and permissions in your cloud environment? Our team of experts can help you implement a least privilege IAM strategy, ensuring that users only have access to the resources they need to do their job, while minimizing the risk of unauthorized access.

items.title: Employee Access Management for Governance
items.alt: Cybersecurity professional wearing an identification badge in a secure office
items.description: Managing employee access to cloud resources is crucial for maintaining security and governance. Our team can help you implement an effective access management strategy, ensuring that employees have the appropriate level of access to cloud resources while minimizing the risk of unauthorized access or data breaches.

items.title: Cloud Penetration Testing
items.alt: Security analyst performing penetration testing on a laptop in a dark environment
items.description: Identify vulnerabilities in your cloud environment before attackers do. Our penetration testing services simulate real-world attacks to uncover weaknesses and provide actionable recommendations to enhance your security posture.

items.title: HIPAA Compliance
items.alt: Professional reviewing HIPAA compliance requirements on a laptop
items.description: Our Consultants understand the HIPAA security Law, and can deliver solutions that meet its requirements, so that your healthcare application can be compliant and secure.

items.title: SOC 2 Compliance
items.alt: Close-up of security protection software interface on a computer screen
items.description: Our Consultants understand the SOC 2 compliance requirements, and can deliver solutions that meet its requirements, so that your application can be compliant and secure.

items.title: Database Management
items.alt: Secure server racks and hardware in a modern data center facility
items.description: Our database management services ensure that your databases are secure, optimized, and compliant with industry standards. We can help you with database design, performance tuning, backup and recovery, and security configurations to protect your data from potential threats.

items.title: Ensure continuous compliance with HIPAA and SOC 2
items.alt: Cybersecurity professional monitoring continuous compliance on a screen
items.description: Unsure if the next change, will cause you to break compliance? We can help you ensure that your cloud environment remains compliant with HIPAA and SOC 2, even as you make changes and updates to your applications.

items.title: Cloud Auditing
items.alt: Female IT engineer auditing cloud servers with a laptop in a data center
items.description: Our cloud auditing services provide you with a comprehensive assessment of your cloud environment, identifying potential security risks and compliance issues.

items.title: Risk Assesment and Mitigation
items.alt: Close-up of network switch LEDs and patch panels used for risk monitoring
items.description: Our risk assessment and mitigation services help you identify potential security risks in your cloud environment and develop strategies to mitigate those risks, ensuring that your applications remain secure and compliant.

items.title: Identity Management Solutions
items.alt: Woman with binary code projected on her face representing digital identity verification
items.description: Our identity management solutions help you manage user identities and access to cloud applications, ensuring that only authorized users have access to sensitive data and applications.

items.name: New Cloud Environment Setup
items.description: We can help you set up a new cloud environment (AWS/Azure/GCP) that meets your specific needs and requirements. Either it is setting up a database or setting up a secure network architecture, we can help you with it.

items.name: Microsoft 365 Administration
items.description: We provide comprehensive Microsoft 365 administration services to help you manage and optimize your Microsoft 365 environment. Our team of experts can assist with user management,device enrollment (Windows,MacOs IOS, Android) security configurations, application integration, and ongoing support to ensure that your Microsoft 365 environment runs smoothly and efficiently.
items.pricing: Starting at $500 / month for 15 hours of support

items.name: Compliance Meeting
items.description: Our company provides a full project completion service for website development, including consultation, design, coding, testing, and deployment. They aim to make the process hassle-free for their clients. Additionally, they offer maintenance services to keep the website up-to-date and functioning optimally, addressing issues, updating content, and making necessary changes.

items.name: Auditing Reports
items.description: Looking to complete your business software project quickly and efficiently? We specialize in helping businesses complete their software projects on a contract basis, offering expert assistance in niche areas to ensure your project is completed on time and on budget. With our years of experience and commitment to quality, you can trust us to deliver top-notch results that meet your specific needs. So why wait? Contact us today to get started on your next project

items.name: Growing Startup with Varied Needs
items.description: We offer Competitive pricing for startups, with a standard Three-Tier Web App with CICD from $300. Does not include Database Management. We get you started with a secure cloud environment, so that when you scale, you know who to choose to help you with your cloud security and compliance needs.

items.name: HIPAA-Compliant AWS Infrastructure
items.description: Designed and deployed a fully HIPAA-compliant cloud infrastructure on AWS for a multi-location medical practice. Implemented encrypted data storage, VPC isolation, IAM policies, and automated audit logging to meet all regulatory requirements.

items.name: SOC 2 Compliance Automation Toolkit
items.description: Built a custom compliance automation toolkit that continuously monitors Azure resources against SOC 2 controls. Includes policy-as-code definitions, automated evidence collection, and a real-time compliance dashboard.

items.name: AWS Firewall Comparison
items.description: Understanding differences between the different firewall offerings AWS offers. Contact us to hear about an even cheaper offering.

items.name: AWS Penetration Testing Guide
items.description: AWS Penetration Testing Guide using the AWS CLI

items.name: HIPAA Identify Compliance With Microsoft Intune Using ADDS
items.description: HIPAA Identity, Access Management, Governance and Compliance Guidelines With Microsoft Intune Using Active Directory Domain Services (ADDS)

items.testimonial: Cloud Compliant Solutions helped us achieve HIPAA compliance in record time. Their team was knowledgeable, responsive, and made the entire process seamless. We now have full confidence in our cloud security posture.

Cloud Compliant delivered a resilient AWS Cloud Solution to store our PII data, and helped understand different architecture choices for different AWS services, and helped us make our decision by performing detailed cost analysis. He helped us justify the cost of security tooling and setup from IAM, to Network firewalls, and Log collections and Dashboard Setup. His understanding of Integrating Splunk and Palo alto firewall`s is remarkable. Giving us observability, and ensuring security against OWASP Top 10 attacks. He was hired to continue working for us and providing support to our clients for his cloud expertise. He also helped us implement CICD pipelines to migrate our applications to cloud, and also help with data migration Tasks. We were able to pass our cloud-environment audit, since prabh ensured to use the right GRC framework (ISO 27001, SOC 2) to ensure he implemented all the security controls

We needed a secure AWS environment set up from scratch and Cloud Compliant Solutions delivered beyond our expectations. Their attention to detail on network architecture and security configurations was outstanding.
Their auditing reports are thorough and actionable. Cloud Compliant Solutions identified vulnerabilities we had overlooked for years. They are now our go-to partner for all compliance needs.
